content: k1 psso k2tog k16 sl1 k1 psso k2tog k8 36 sts row 114 purl row 115 k7 sl1 k1 psso k2tog k14 sl1 k1 psso k2tog k7 32 sts row 116 purl row 117 k6 sl1 k1 psso k2tog k12 sl1 k1 psso k2tog k6 28 sts copyright © 2013 sarah gasson www knitables com row 118 purl row 119 k5 sl1 k1 psso k2tog k10 sl1 k1 psso k2tog k5 24 sts break yarn leaving a long end thread through remaining stitches on needle draw up loosely and fasten_off loop using red cast on 6 sts row 1 k2 p2 k2 row 2 p2 k2 p2 row 3 - 30 repeat row 1 and 2 14 times row 31 cast off join the side edges of the stocking working up from the gathered toe the cast off stitches which have been threaded onto the yarn should blend nicely to form a neat seam at the front of the toe attach the loop to the stocking the knitables small meerkat fits very snuggly inside the stocking and makes an adorable gift the meerkat pattern is available at www knitables com copyright © 2013 sarah gasson www knitables com
